name: Putting Away
description:
A small simple mini golf game.

Made in a week by AngelOfDreamz for the BlackThornProd Game Jam 2021.

Controlls:

Click and hold left mouse button to aim and release to fire, the ball will move in the direction of where you released the mouse.

Press the "M" key to mute the sound.

Escape to pause.

Credit:

Art, code, music, sound made by AngelOfDreamz.

I used Aseprite for art, SFXR for sound effects, Beepbox for music, and Unity for every thing else.
